title: Ghost Talker
description: Elinor Chalamet’s talent to speak with the dead may have landed her in the soup.Witty and clever, Elinor uses her mediumship skills to hunt for her father’s killer. So when a body in the canal brings her to the morgue, she’s happy to help until Tristan Fontaine, the Duke de Archambeau, takes over the case and places her under house arrest.Between possessions and poltergeists, she’ll solve the case even if it means putting the duke in his place. Actually, that part of the investigation may be a pleasure!Welcome to Alenbonné, a coastal city with picturesque promenades along the canals and where the ghosts never sleep. A country where spirits and murder are just a breath away.The first of a six-part Gaslamp fantasy ghost mystery series featuring a strong-minded female Sherlock Holmes-like character in a slow burn romance_____________________________________________A six part novella series for lovers of Gaslamp fantasy#1 Ghost Talker#2 Delicious Death#3 Spirit Guide#4 Gray Lady#5 Untimely Grave#6 Ghastly Mistake_____________________________________________This novella is friendly to ages 16+.
author: Byrd Nash
